nodes.text: The Echani foil was a sword crafted to honor Raskta Fenni, the greatest Echani duelist of her time. Many of these weapons were sold but the difficulties in the lightsaber-resistant cortosis weave allowed only a few to survive.
Around the year 3956 BBY Commander Grann, a Sith diplomat stationed on the planet Manaan owned an Echani Foil.
